about_the_game:
Seeker: Quest - The Monster Collecting Adventure

Catch & Hatch new playable characters, loot items, artifacts, and abilities in this top-down shooter & monster collector. Explore cute and colorful, handcrafted worlds, battle wild Seekers, and collect them to build your ultimate team.

Core Features

  • 🐾 Collect Seekers, Build Your Team
    Every Seeker you encounter can join your crew. Defeat them, collect their Seekeggs, and hatch them into playable characters (And get that juicy Steam Achievement). With each Seeker having their own set of abilities, you’ll mix, match, and experiment to build the perfect team for any challenge.

  • ⚔️ Fast-Paced Action
    Switch Seekers mid-battle to unleash buffs or activate Hero Abilities to survive just a little longer. Naturia Planet offers bullet-hell chaos, hidden secrets, and endless ways to customize your team for the ultimate reward: By catching all the Seekers!

🏠 Build and Upgrade Your Village

Gather resources, unlock new buildings, and heroes to give your Seekers all kinds of upgrades. As your village grows, so does your team. It’s not just about leveling up—it’s about unlocking powers to take on intense boss fights.

🌿 Adventure & Exploration

Stroll through lush, handcrafted levels packed with surprises. From traps and treasures to artifacts and bullets, Seeker: Quest rewards exploration. Even if your team gets wiped out, luck might help you hatch a new Seeker with perfect attributes—or you’ll find Orbs of Resurrection to bring your pumped-up team back into the fight!

🌄 Participate in Seasonal Events

Each month, there is a unique event monster available to catch and hatch. Once the season is over, it will never return! Each season comes with an island featuring its own challenges and, ultimately, the battle against the new Seeker you need to defeat.

📜 The Story

Resurrected by the god-like Seeker Leerking, the planet Naturia has become a paradise for Seekers. But when humans arrived, seeking the precious Sylvan Ore, a rebellion erupted, forcing the invaders back. Now, the Wild Seekers control the land, but something more sinister is at work beneath the surface.

The Jesterians, exiled rebels from the Abyss—a realm of darkness beyond comprehension—accidentally arrived on Naturia through a portal. Exiled from Sylvania, their once-beloved home, they endured the Abyss’s horrors and survived. Now stranded on this strange planet, they must fight for survival and find a way back to their home.

Led by Ive, a fearless young leader with a vision to restore balance, the Jesterians include:

  • Draven: A former King's Guard searching for redemption.

  • Naman’Ghal: A shaman deeply connected to the planet.

  • Azreal: A Sylvan Mage bent on revenge.

Together, they must uncover the secrets of Naturia as the shadow of Leerking looms ever closer.

🎮 Join Early Access Today

Dive into Seeker: Quest with 45-90 minutes of exciting gameplay in Early Access. More Seekers, levels, and adventures are coming, and your feedback will help shape the world of Seeker: Quest.

It’s time to hatch a new adventure—are you ready?
